long_description: The travel-ready Craghoppers NosiLife Clara Trousers for girls feature integrated UPF 40 sun protection and NosiLife insect repellency to keep her comfortable as she explores the great outdoors. Nylon and elastane fabric is permanently treated with pyrethroid, an insect repellent that provides 90% protection from mosquitoes and other biting insects. Craghopper NosiLife Clara Trousers feature hand pockets and 2 rear pockets. Durable water repellent finish beads up moisture so it rolls off; pants are also quick drying.
short_description: The travel-ready Craghoppers NosiLife Clara Trousers for girls feature integrated UPF 40 sun protection and NosiLife insect repellency to keep her comfortable as she explores the great outdoors.
